SELECT b.region_name as lanIdName, c.org_name as orgName, sum(a.TOTAL_IN_NUM) as totalInNum, sum(a.TOTAL_OUT_NUM) as totalOutNum, sum(a.stock_num) as stockNum, sum(a.PURCHASE_NUM) as purchaseNum, sum(a.MANUAL_NUM) as manualNum, sum(a.TRANS_IN_NUM) as transInNum, sum(a.SELL_NUM) as sellNum, sum(a.UNCONTRACT_NUM) as uncontractNum, sum(a.CONTRACT_NUM) as contractNum, sum(a.REGISTER_NUM) as registerNum, sum(a.TRANS_OUT_NUM) as transOutNum, sum(a.RETURN_NUM) as returnNum, sum(a.WEEK_AVG_SELL_NUM) as weekAvgSellNum FROM RPT_PARTNER_OPERATING_DAY a LEFT JOIN par_merchant par ON par.merchant_id = a.PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_common_org c ON INSTR(par.PAR_CRM_ORG_PATH_CODE, c.path_code) AND c.org_level='3' LEFT JOIN sys_common_region b ON a.city_id = b.region_id WHERE 1=1
and str_to_date(a.DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{req.dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(a.DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{req.dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and a.CITY_ID in
#{item}
and
INSTR( par.PAR_CRM_ORG_PATH_CODE, #{item})
group by a.CITY_ID,SUBSTRING_INDEX(par.PAR_CRM_ORG_PATH_CODE,'.',4)
